mapper.select: select b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.bdate, b.bcontent, b.bcount, (select count(*) from COIN_BOARD_LIKE bl where b.bno = bl.bno) as blike, (select count(*) from COIN_BOARD_hate bh where b.bno = bh.bno) as bhate from coin_board b where b.bno = #{bno} order by bno desc
mapper.update: update coin_board set title=#{title},bcontent=#{bcontent} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from coin_board_like where bno = #{bno} and id like #{id}
delete from coin_board_hate where bno = #{bno} and id like #{id}
mapper.update: update coin_board set bcount = bcount + 1 where bno = #{bno}
